field.name: JSWT.SYSTEM_MODAL
field.description: Style constant for system modal behavior (value is 1<<17).

field.name: JSWT.POP_UP
field.description: Style constant for pop up menu behavior (value is 1<<3).

field.name: JSWT.RETRY
field.description: The MessageBox style constant for a RETRY button, valid combinations are ABORT|RETRY|IGNORE, RETRY|CANCEL (value is 1<<10).

field.name: JSWT.APPLICATION_MODAL
field.description: Style constant for application modal behavior (value is 1<<16).

field.name: JSWT.ICON_QUESTION
field.description: The MessageBox style constant for question icon behavior (value is 1<<2).

field.name: JSWT.ICON_WORKING
field.description: The MessageBox style constant for "working" icon behavior (value is 1<<4).

field.name: JSWT.MULTI
field.description: Style constant for multi-selection behavior in lists and multiple line support on text fields (value is 1<<1).

field.name: JSWT.NO
field.description: The MessageBox style constant for NO button, valid combinations are YES|NO, YES|NO|CANCEL (value is 1<<7).

field.name: JSWT.SEPARATOR
field.description: Style constant for line separator behavior (value is 1<<1).

field.name: JSWT.CASCADE
field.description:
Style constant for cascade behavior (value is 1<<6).
Used By:
MenuItem

field.name: JSWT.BAR
field.description: Style constant for menu bar behavior (value is 1<<1).

field.name: JSWT.DOWN
field.description: Style constant for align down behavior (value is 1<<10, since align DOWN and align BOTTOM are considered the same).

field.name: JSWT.CLOSE
field.description: Style constant for close box trim (value is 1<<6, since we do not distinguish between CLOSE style and MENU style).

field.name: JSWT.BOTTOM
field.description: Style constant for align bottom behavior (value is 1<<10, since align DOWN and align BOTTOM are considered the same).

field.name: JSWT.FULL_SELECTION
field.description: Style constant for full row selection behavior (value is 1<<16).

field.name: JSWT.ERROR_MENUITEM_NOT_CASCADE
field.description: JSWT error constant indicating that a menu item which needed to have the cascade style had some other style instead (value is 27).

field.name: JSWT.ERROR_MENU_NOT_DROP_DOWN
field.description: JSWT error constant indicating that a menu which needed to have the drop down style had some other style instead (value is 21).

field.name: JSWT.YES
field.description: The MessageBox style constant for YES button, valid combinations are YES|NO, YES|NO|CANCEL (value is 1<<6).

field.name: JSWT.ICON_WARNING
field.description: The MessageBox style constant for warning icon behavior (value is 1<<3).

field.name: JSWT.CANCEL
field.description: The MessageBox style constant for a CANCEL button, valid combinations are OK|CANCEL, YES|NO|CANCEL, RETRY|CANCEL (value is 1<<8).

field.name: JSWT.TOP
field.description: Style constant for align top behavior (value is 1<<7, since align UP and align TOP are considered the same).

field.name: JSWT.DEFAULT
field.description: Indicates that a default should be used (value is 0). NOTE: In SWT, this value is -1, but that causes problems with bitwise JavaScript operators...

field.name: JSWT.MENU
field.description: Style constant for shell menu trim (value is 1<<6, since we do not distinguish between CLOSE style and MENU style).

field.name: JSWT.ICON_INFORMATION
field.description: The MessageBox style constant for information icon behavior (value is 1<<1).

field.name: JSWT.ABORT
field.description: The MessageBox style constant for an ABORT button; the only valid combination is ABORT|RETRY|IGNORE (value is 1<<9).

field.name: JSWT.NONE
field.description: A constant known to be zero (0), typically used in operations which take bit flags to indicate that "no bits are set".

field.name: JSWT.ICON_ERROR
field.description: The MessageBox style constant for error icon behavior (value is 1).

field.name: JSWT.OK
field.description: The MessageBox style constant for an OK button, valid combinations are OK, OK|CANCEL (value is 1<<5).

field.name: JSWT.ERROR_WIDGET_DISPOSED
field.description: JSWT error constant indicating that an attempt was made to invoke an JSWT operation using a widget which had already been disposed (value is 24).

field.name: JSWT.DROP_DOWN
field.description: Style constant for drop down menu/list behavior (value is 1<<2).

field.name: JSWT.IGNORE
field.description: The MessageBox style constant for an IGNORE button, the only valid combination is ABORT|RETRY|IGNORE (value is 1<<11).

field.name: JSWT.SINGLE
field.description: Style constant for single selection behavior in lists and single line support on text fields (value is 1<<2).

field.name: JSWT.UP
field.description: Style constant for align up behavior (value is 1<<7, since align UP and align TOP are considered the same).

field.name: JSWT.DRAG
field.description: Indicates that a user-interface component is being dragged, for example dragging the thumb of a scroll bar (value is 1).
